description: Styles for the comment list component in the Instagram clone frontend.

classes.name: .comment-list
classes.description: Styles for the overall comment list container.

classes.name: .comment-list__item
classes.description: Styles for individual comment items within the list.

classes.name: .comment-list__avatar
classes.description: Styles for the avatar image of the comment user.

classes.name: .comment-list__user
classes.description: Styles for the username display of the comment's author.

classes.name: .comment-list__text
classes.description: Styles for the text content of the comment.
